info.name: dim_brighten_rate_04
info.description: Using 6 dim fixtures and 1 CCT fixture to test a rim and brighten rates. Using daylight as an input source and verifying that dim/brighten rates are being followed.

item.name: Set DL Interval to 1 sec & wait 1.5sec

exec: tests["Value of pwm output 1 is greater than 80 but less than 100 "] = (out1<100&&out1>80);
tests["Value of pwm output 2 is greater than 80 but less than 100 "] = (out2<100&&out2>80);
tests["Value of pwm output 3 is greater than 80 but less than 100 "] = (out3<100&&out3>80);
tests["Value of pwm output 4 is greater than 80 but less than 100 "] = (out4<100&&out4>80);
tests["Value of pwm output 5 is greater than 80 but less than 100 "] = (out5<100&&out5>80);
tests["Value of pwm output 6 is greater than 80 but less than 100 "] = (out6<100&&out6>80);
tests["Value of pwm output 7 is greater than 80 but less than 100 "] = (out7<100&&out7>80);
tests["Value of pwm output 1 is greater than 50 but less than 70 "] = (out1<70&&out1>50);
tests["Value of pwm output 2 is greater than 50 but less than 70 "] = (out2<70&&out2>50);
tests["Value of pwm output 3 is greater than 50 but less than 70 "] = (out3<70&&out3>50);
tests["Value of pwm output 4 is greater than 50 but less than 70 "] = (out4<70&&out4>50);

tests["Value of pwm output 7 is greater than 50 but less than 70 "] = (out7<70&&out7>50);
tests["Value of pwm output 1 is greater than 20 but less than 40 "] = (out1<40&&out1>20);
tests["Value of pwm output 2 is greater than 20 but less than 40 "] = (out2<40&&out2>20);
tests["Value of pwm output 3 is greater than 20 but less than 40 "] = (out3<40&&out3>20);
tests["Value of pwm output 4 is greater than 20 but less than 40 "] = (out4<40&&out4>20);
tests["Value of pwm output 5 is greater than 20 but less than 40 "] = (out5<40&&out5>20);
tests["Value of pwm output 6 is greater than 20 but less than 40 "] = (out6<40&&out6>20);
tests["Value of pwm output 7 is greater than 20 but less than 40 "] = (out7<40&&out7>20);
tests["Value of pwm output 1 is greater than or equal to 0 but less than 20 "] = (out1<20&&out1>=0);
tests["Value of pwm output 2 is greater than or equal to 0 but less than 20 "] = (out2<20&&out2>=0);
tests["Value of pwm output 3 is greater than or equal to 0 but less than 20 "] = (out3<20&&out3>=0);
tests["Value of pwm output 4 is greater than or equal to 0 but less than 20 "] = (out4<20&&out4>=0);
tests["Value of pwm output 5 is greater than or equal to 0 but less than 20 "] = (out5<20&&out5>=0);
tests["Value of pwm output 6 is greater than or equal to 0 but less than 20 "] = (out6<20&&out6>=0);
tests["Value of pwm output 7 is greater than or equal to 0 but less than 20 "] = (out7<20&&out7>=0);

item.name: Set DL Interval to 1 sec & wait 1.5sec

exec: tests["Value of pwm output 1 is greater than or equal to 0 but less than 20 "] = (out1<20&&out1>=0);
tests["Value of pwm output 2 is greater than or equal to 0 but less than 20 "] = (out2<20&&out2>=0);
